body: 5711 (return) [ Tiridates had sustained a war against Maximin. caused by the hatred of the latter against Christianity. Armenia was the first _nation_ which embraced Christianity. About the year 276 it was the religion of the king, the nobles, and the people of Armenia. From St. Martin, Supplement to Le Beau, v. i. p. 78.ÑÑCompare Preface to History of Vartan by Professor Neumann, p ix.ÑM.]
